about_the_game:
A Great Responsibility




In the distant future presented by Ternion, you take control of four members of the titular team of mercenaries working for the galactic organization known as the Defence and Tutelage of Abiogenesis, more commonly referred to as the DTA. Based on your decisions and relationships, the game has multiple endings.

Desert, the captain of Ternion and leader of the DTA, has been accidentally infected by a prototype symbiont designed to provide better performance in battle. The DTA discovered that the prototype's unstable nature results in the destruction and overwriting of brain cells, ultimately driving to madness those who come in direct contact with it.

Desert's state of mad delirium eventually drives him to seek the destruction of every inhabited planet in the existence. Upon discovering this plot, you, Fushiko, and Yuki, rebel against former leader, going to any and every length necessary to stop him and spare all civilizations of the Milky Way a terrible fate.

A Modern Mix of Vintage




Fight your enemies with a frenetic RPG combat system that combines the bustle of modern JRPGs with the tactical aspect of classic ones. You'll have all the time you need to carefully plan and execute your attacks with the turn-based combat system when not wandering the worlds. All the time, that is, if your enemy doesn't intervene in their own imminent demise.

A Weird Adventure




Get immersed in the course of events and explore relationships with your various teammates while keeping yourself focused on your true mission: saving the life in the universe.

In Ternion, you will:
  • Fly a spaceship through the Milky Way.
  • Solve logic puzzles & mini-games.
  • Plan an attack on the Ternion spaceship.
  • Dynamically alter the story flow through character relationships.
  • Learn about the civilizations you visit.
  • Have the possibility of unlocking an "open world" experience before the game's end.

Sole Development


Unfortunately, Ternion is a zero-budget passion project created by a single developer; if circumstances allow for it, the project will expand by gaining additional features and side missions, but right now that comes secondarily to the game's overall completion.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 3.2 GHz | AMD FX-4100 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, 2 GB | AMD Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770, 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1500X 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060, 3 GB | AMD Radeon RX 570, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The fate of all civilization rests in the hands of four teenagers trying to stop their former leader from eradicating all life in the universe after he is driven insane as a consequence of infection by his own creation.
supported_languages:
English*, Italian
*languages with full audio support
